arabic.title: إسمي
text: عمري لو ألف عام في عنيكي
وبرغم اني في السباحة مش غشيم

english.title: My name
text: Why would my name matter to you ?
I am a lover who had found you
Even if i was one thousand years old in your eyes
I find myself as a baby
and find within you warmth and safety
I have some words for your eyes
that no one in the world
And even if everything was said
your eyes are a song in my alienation*
i would create a new meaning from it
you are the sun, even when it sets
it rises  and lightens the world
about a story of a lover
You are a very high wave
I still wanted to drown myself
and embrace me when I'm dead
from you and to you I return
from you and to you I return

arabic.title: الشهيد
text: للأرض دي وافديها حتى لو بروحي
وفي حق عرضي مش هساوم أو هماطل
أنا هنا لأن الله خلقني حر
مش عبد او ممسوح دماغي ولاجاهل

english.title: The Martyr
text: this ground is written on it with our blood
this ground has a thousand martyrs in it
but the wolves are going to be met with fire and  iron
it's protected by the order of my God
and the one who thinks or intends..
to do evil things, should only blame their soul
if I have a more precious thing..
than my soul, I would've gave it..
to this ground and I will sacrifice even my soul for it
right can never turn into wrong in just a moment
and I won't bargain or stall in the right of my ground
I am here because God created me to be free
not a slave, brain washed or ignorant

arabic.title: صورة معكوسة
text: ماعادش فاضل ع الفراق غير خطوتين
وانتي هاتمشيهم أكيد لو بعد حين
وأنا بس مستني اليقين إننا مفارقين
مني يادوب نظرة عيون مليانة خوف

english.title: A reflection
text: there are only two steps left to separation
and you're going to walk them sooner or later
and I'm just waiting for the sign to part ways
I was a sinner from the beginning
God has sent me a hundred message
that you have a heart of stone
your truth when I chose you
of me is a mere look that's filled with fear
a lost word with choked letters
it's like you're a reflection on the water
and when I come to touch it, there's nothing I can see

arabic.title: كل ما في القلب
text: ماقدرتش انسي عنيكي لما قالتلي اه .
كل ما في القلب ده ليكي
كل ما في القلب ده ليكي
ماقدرتش انسي عنيكي لما قالتلي اه .
كل ما ف القلب ده ليكي
كل ما في القلب ده ليكي

english.title: What in my heart
text: I was walking when i had memories
in my heart like many others
the taste of pain, the taste of crying
and you were here by chance
when the pain killed the hope
your god threw your complete love in my heart
i couldn't forget your eye when it said yes
when you accepted to give life to my heart
what in my heart is for you
where were you? i was waiting for you
go in my heart with god's peace
what in my heart is for you
where were you? i was waiting for you
i can't do anything with love
if i give you up i will stray
if i get lost in you i will give up
i was walking with a flower
in my hand and it died years ago
time has stopped when you're here
the flower came back to life
your shadow called me for love and i replied
i couldn't forget your eye when it said yes
when you accepted to give life to my heart
what in my heart is for you
where were you? i was waiting for you
go in my heart with god's peace
what in my heart is for you
where were you? i was waiting for you
i can't do anything in love
if i give you up i will stray
if i get lost in you i will give up

arabic.title: يا سمرا
text: صبرت صبر لو شاله الجبل هايميل
انا كنتلك زاهد وكانت سبحتي شوقي

english.title: Ya samra
text: don't open a wound that I have lived it before
say to the time ..come back time
o dream,i bet my age on it
hey brunette (Ya Samra) Your eyes are liars
I swear (wallahi) if i adore a stone it will soften
I water you (give you) Longing and you water me (give me) tears
I had patient, a patience If the mountain carry it will tilt
I didn't see from you until a beautiful response
I was a ascetic for you and my bearish was my longing
you were a poison in my veins
Thanks for the joy of the beginnings
and i will try to forget the harsh endings
Thanks for the joy of the beginnings
and an end left marks in the hearts
